text: Giovanni Francesco Zagordo (died 1599) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Belcastro (1598–1599) (in Latin) (in Latin) and Bishop of Città Ducale (1593–1598). (in Latin) ==Biography== On 7 April 1593, Giovanni Francesco Zagordo was appointed during the papacy of Pope Clement VIII as Bishop of Città Ducale. On 23 February 1598, he was appointed during the papacy of Pope Clement VIII as Bishop of Belcastro. He served as Bishop of Belcastro until his death in 1599. == See also == *Catholic Church in Italy == References == ==External links and additional sources== * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:16th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Clement VIII Category:1599 deaths
title: Giovanni Francesco Zagordo
